attributes.action:
Ban Halal Slaughter in United Kingdom
Rspca and Vets condone this practice
attributes.additional_details:
In what is thought of as a society of Animal lovers most are outraged at this practice. For those that buy these products after slaughter unwittingly are then appalled to learn of it
It has no place in a civilised society
No person or animal should be allowed to suffer slowly an traumatic, slow, painful death .
We, the signers want this practice halted with immeadiate effect in the UK
attributes.background:
The practice of Halal Slaughter is a view of many thousands of Inhumane Slaughter with a very slow and agonising death for many millions of animals and should be abolished within the UK
The Rspca themselves condone this as do many vets due to the extreme suffering of the animals
